meta.title: EU AI Act Compliance | Intelligent Automation Solutions
meta.description: Navigate the EU AI Act with confidence. Our AI-powered automation solutions ensure regulatory compliance while accelerating your business growth.

hero.heading: The EU AI Act and GDPR in AI Automation
hero.subheading: AI regulation as roadmap, not roadblock
hero.description: Implementing AI in your organisation isn't just a technical process — it also means aligning with regulation. The EU AI Act and the GDPR determine how AI may be used in your operations. And rightly so. These laws aren't a barrier. They're a blueprint for responsible automation. With the right approach, you avoid risks — and build stronger.

whenApply.heading: When do the AI Act and GDPR apply?
whenApply.description: Almost any AI-based automation falls under this legislation when you:
items: process personal data (like customer info or job applications)
automate decisions that impact individuals (such as quotes or evaluations)
use generative AI (like ChatGPT or other LLMs)
let staff interact with AI tools in their daily work
whenApply.additionalInfo: The GDPR governs the use of personal data. The AI Act builds on this with specific requirements around transparency, human oversight, and risk management for AI systems.

requirements.heading: What do you need to have in place?
requirements.description: When using AI in your workflows, the following often applies:

items.title: Clarity for users
items.description: When AI is involved, people must know.

items.title: Zero Data Retention
items.description: For sensitive data, GPT can be configured to avoid all storage and logging.

items.title: DPA (Data Processing Agreement)
items.description: If you use GPT via OpenAI, a DPA is legally required.

items.title: Cloud Act transparency
items.description: Because OpenAI is a US-based company, customers must be informed about the potential implications of US legislation.

items.title: AI literacy
items.description: As of February 2025, employees must understand how to use AI safely and responsibly.

howWeHelp.heading: How we help
howWeHelp.description: At Keyholders, we guide clients end-to-end. We don't make automation harder — we make it easier. Our role doesn't end after implementation — we remain available for as long as your automation is running.
items: We analyse your process and identify which regulations apply
We guide your DPA request with OpenAI (if needed)
We configure Zero Data Retention on all GPT integrations
We clearly inform you about risks like the US CLOUD Act
We document your AI workflows in line with the AI Act
We train your team using practical, role-specific AI literacy modules

roadmap.heading: AI regulation as roadmap, not roadblock
roadmap.description: The AI Act is not a slowdown. It's a framework that shows how to scale AI safely. With the right support, you don't need to delay — you reduce mistakes and speed up implementation.

scan.heading: Free AI Scan: know where you stand
scan.description: We offer a free AI Scan that:
items: and shows how to become compliant without extra technical hurdles
scan.noSales: The scan is free of charge and without any sales push. Just clarity.

hero.heading: AI Automation That Actually Works
hero.description: See how other companies are working smarter—not over years, but within days. We build GPT solutions that connect to your processes. No demo tools, but systems that deliver value today.

items.title: Tailored to You

items.title: Lightning Fast Deployment
items.description: From idea to working flow in 2 hours. Sometimes faster. No waiting, no roadmap hassle.

items.title: Results You Notice
items.description: Less error-prone. More oversight. Time savings from day one.

caseStudies.description: A GPT that allows each employee to write pedagogical activities in the Reggio Emilia style—the core vision of the organization.
caseStudies.clientQuote: Keyholders saves us time, but more importantly: it has enriched our way of working. And yes, I use it for my emails too. But that's off the record.

caseStudies.description: A GPT that summarizes the most important cybersecurity news every morning. Customized to fit her tone. During the first session, we built the brand identity, tone of voice, and the entire automation.
caseStudies.clientQuote: I don't know how much time Christian has saved me. Just that it's a lot. And I love numbers, so that's saying something.

caseStudies.description: A GPT that works with Canva. Automatically creating a new pub quiz every day—ready to use.
caseStudies.clientQuote: I sent an email. Two hours later I had a link to a working GPT. What used to take 90 minutes per day is now handled in seconds. Incredible.

caseStudies.description: Ashra dictates his quotes via WhatsApp. GPT analyzes the message, pulls the right prices from the database, drafts the proposal in Fokker style, and puts it in his inbox.
caseStudies.clientQuote: I just asked: what can you build? And it grew into a fully automated process. Everything works. I recommend anyone who wants to speed up processes to do that free AI scan.

conclusion.heading: Automation Without Complexity
conclusion.description: The companies above aren't tech companies. They just want to work faster, better, more consistently. We make that possible, with AI solutions that fit your culture and your processes.
